content.detailedDescription:
The contributor (me) wishes to remain anonymous.  i used to work as a reporter at a canadian news outlet in the 1990's.  one day (probably around october 1995) i was working in the newsroom when a man came in and asked to speak to a reporter.  the man identified himself as ken suominen of windsor, ontario.  he stated that he had recently experienced a ufo encounter and asked if anyone else had reported the same event.  i told him that to the best of my knowledge no one else had.  he then handed me a detailed handwritten description of the event and requested that i file a news report to see if anyone else saw what he saw.  i told him i would read his account and contact him if i required more information.  he then left my office.

i have no specific memory of mr suominen but i had not met him before or since.  i did not write down his address or phone number at the time we spoke, which would lead me to believe he may have been reluctant to provide this information.  or perhaps he did not have a permanent address or telephone number.  i do recall thinking he seemed sincere about his claim at the time.  however i was not willing to approach my assignment editor to do anything with his story.

the pages he gave me were copied on a "thermal roll" fax machine and stapled together at the upper-left.  i placed them in a "curiosity file" and forgot about them.  somehow over 15 years and several career changes the "curiosity file" made its way to a box of old papers at my home, which i recently went through while preparing for an upcoming move.  i have heard about your organization and your website and i thought you might find this useful.

mr suominen's written account is provided as a scanned .Pdf attachment, which i hope will upload correctly.  again, i do not wish to be associated with this report or contacted by your organization in any way.  i have nothing more to add.
content.summary: Contributor is filing a report of a stranger's ufo sighting.

content.detailedDescription:
At approx. 7:15 am eastern dst i was entering st rt 2 from st rt 60 eastbound in erie co., oh. i was on the entrance ramp when i noticed a low flying, fast moving object to my left, or north. it was just starting to get light, but the sky was still dark with heavy clouds. at first i thought it was an aircraft, but at the speed it was flying at that height made me remark to my passenger to look also. i slowed to a stop and we both observed that the object was not an airplane but a long, dart like object with a bright, almost led like, white light at each end. it flew in a straight line for what i estimate was 1/2 of a mile, about 1/4 mile away at no more than 300 ft. altitude. i estimated the speed to be over 300 mph. i had the window down and could hear no noise from yhe object.
i am a retired police officer and have received training in speed estimation for use with speeding radar citations. the object then either disappeared entirely, or made an immediate 90 degree turn to the north and accelerated very rapidly out of sight. i thought i saw a diminishing light to the north where the object disappeared, but i cannot say for sure. my passenger is a paramedic/fireman and he also observed the object speeding across the sky and then vanish. there was no flame trail or smoke that would be associated with fireworks or a flare, nor was it an airplane.
content.summary: Fast moving, dart like object w/2 bright  white lights

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were sitting outside after dark in our spa relaxing after a long week.  we were chatting when my husband says "do you see that?"  i said what?  he says "a big black triangle, its moving pretty fast."  i am trying to follow where he his pointing and i am thinking to myself that i dont hear anything.  he is pointing almost straight up but toward the sse which is towards the water (galveston bay).  i mention that i cant see it and then he says "it's gone."
i said "what was it?"  he said "it must be a new stealth plane although it was bigger."  he said he noticed it because, as it was flying, it created a distortion in the air around it, much like the heat distortion one sees on the roadway on a hot summer day.

now, we live near ellington field (an old air base) and nasa jsc.  we see and hear lots of different types of planes all the time so i know he has a pretty good frame of reference.  so we tell ourselves it must have come from ellington.  

well just the other day i was watching tv and came across a show about ufo's.  they started to describe flying black triangles.  i recorded the show and then asked my husband to watch it.  he said that what he saw was very similar but there were no lights.  after reading more and finding out that these sightings are very common, i decided to write this report.
btw, we are not "ufo nuts", we are educated (chemist and engineer) middle class people who lead very average lives.

in summary: large black triangle, no lights, no sound, with distortion of the air around it (shimmering).  moving very fast.
content.summary: Black triangle over seabrook

content.detailedDescription:
We took a few days off to go to the gulf to ride seadoo's as it was still too cold to ride in st louis.  we were on our way home, heading up a back road to my friends parents house in mississippi to stay the night before returning on our way home. around midnight the night light up like day time, never saw anything so bright that could turn the night into day.  looked up and we saw a white maybe a bit bluish fireball heading from east to west at about a 45 degree arc (not at a straight 45 degree angle but kind of curved) it was way slower than a meteor, i would say it took 30 to 45 seconds to fall all the way to the ground. it was  in between the size of a quarter and a half dollar from my viewpoint, so it was much larger than a meteor.

this happened back in 96', i had never really thought of it as a ufo before but i was watching some youtube videos and it made me think about the thing i saw.  i never thought it was a meteor, but never did have anyone give a good explanation of what it was.  whatever it was it hit the ground, i remember we braced our selves thinking the ground would shake when it hit but it did not, no sound nothing.  we did think about trying to find it but there was no way we could have.

if you have any idea odf what this was please let me know, or if you had any other reports about this please let me know.

oh,  the dat could be wrong,  i am pretty sure it was march,  could have been 95'  or 96'  just not sure.

thanks,

john
content.summary: Huge fireball hit ground.

content.detailedDescription: I was ouutside on my trampoline from about 7pm to 12pm watching shooting stars with my brother. we had been out there for a while so my brother went inside to go to bed. i asked him to stay outside because we might see more shooting stars but he wanted to go to sleep. so i stayed out there just star gazing and hoping to see more shooting stars when something caught my eye and i thought it was another shooting star so i quickly look and find it wasnt a shooting star it was incredible. it was about 7 balls of light not very bright but bright enough to see, and it was in formation in the shape of a boomerang. also out of the 7 balls 2 or 3 switched spots .It came over my house from the east and was headed south west. now, what is really incredible about it was that i was talking about this subject all day and then i see one. it really satisfyed my couriosity for wanting to see a ufo in my lifetime. i cant go into detail about my emotions and feelings and the insight it gave me for my life but i just want people to know what i saw. also what went through my head the second i saw it was what am i looking at. i thought it might be a bunch of birds in a v formation but it was to bright to be birds and going to fast.
content.summary: I saw a boomerang shaped ufo in modesto at 12pm

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my car, driving north on farm to market road in brewster at about 30 mph. it was almost 7pm and dark out. through the trees ahead of me on the left i saw some red and white lights. at first i thought it was a plane, but as i got closer i realized the lights were in the same place; i was actually getting closer to them, and they were quite low, just over the trees. i then thought it was a tower of some sort, although i know there is no tower in that area...It is all residential and quite wooded.  i came upon a place where the trees thinned and i could see the lights more clearly. there was no traffic, so i stopped my car in the middle of the road and just stared at it. i remember getting a very strong nervous feeling in my stomach, i almost felt queasy, thinking to myself "what the heck am i looking at??"  

after doing some calculations later when i got home, i'm estimating that it was about 300 feet away from me, just above the trees.  it was not moving at all.  it had flashing lights, white and red, and a bit of blue; my recollection is there was only one blue light and the rest were white and red. all were blinking, but were not placed in any particular configuration. i was unable to determine the shape of the object; it was quite dark and the lights provided no illumination, but the impression i got was that it was round, but more like a short cylinder. i would estimate that it was about 5 times bigger than a car.  there was no noise.

i watched it for about 30 seconds before i suddenly thought to take a photo with my phone but before i could get it, i saw the object start moving very slowly to the west--away from me.  that freaked me out, because i think maybe in the back of my mind i was still believing it to be some sort of tower.  the lights remained in the same position, meaning that the object didn't spin around as far as i could tell.  then a car came up behind me and i had to start moving. 

i continued to look to my left and could still see the object intermittently through the trees, moving away from me. at the end of farm to market, i turned left onto route 164, then right onto cornwall hill road and drove to the top of the hill and pulled into the subdivision there, facing west.  i could still see the lights, but by now they were quite small and it looked like an airplane from this distance. it appeared to still be moving quite slowly, and quite low...Way too low for an airplane. it disappeared over a distant hill.  the route it was moving would have taken it directly over the interstate in carmel, so i checked  to see if there had been any ufo reports, but i didn't see any. this happened on 10/21/09 between approx. 6:50 and 7:00 pm.
content.summary: Stationary blinking lights over the trees, then started slowly moving

content.detailedDescription:
Reporting this for others who may have heard this as well:first, i live in tomball, which is a nw burb. of houston.

i was watching a film i tivo'ed ,this was in the early am range,3:00am- we were all in bed-being my husband,myself and 3 dogs.Husband was sound asleep.

my younger dog decided to go outside- i heard her lift the dog door and go out; but seconds later i heard her bark and run back inside.
our bedroom and dining area -where the back porch door/dog door is- are side by side.So 20ft. away -no problem with hearing her at all.
she came and got back into bed but kept looking at the window - i figured she was seeing the reflection of the tv in the glass-which often gets her attention.
the one blind closest to me was closed- the other blind was turned open.This is a huge double window facing our back yard. she finally put her head down and slept.The other two dogs slept on,they never stirred.

about 15 minutes later - i heard a rumbling,deep sound in the distance.It caught my attention enough that i paused the movie to better listen.It was coming from what seemed to be the north/north west -and getting closer and louder. the sound was much like the rumble of air conditioning when it kicks on.Our unit was not on. it was a very cool and comfortable night -
i listened and noticed it getting closer and closer -and thinking that is no plane or helicopter -so what the hell is it ??
i was surrounded by the dogs and couldnt easily get out of bed and the sound was starting to scare me!
so i just laid there and listened to it go over.It was all sound; there was no vibration of the house. it sounded like it was flying low. our backyard faces south -the airports are to the immediate east and south/east of where we live.I watched through the blind that was open,which would give me a view of it heading anywhere east- to see if i could see it pass -try to see the identifying lights- but it must have stayed on a direct course south -or south/west -because i never saw it head the other direction. i just listened to it go away.

e-mail is: lookingtothestars@hotmail.Com for anyone who may have heard or maybe even saw something that time range and area.
content.summary: Unusual sound -no sighting

content.detailedDescription:
We are writing this after seeing that another individual wrote in to ufo stalker for what must be the same object that myself and two close friends watched for close to two hours. we were in the area of 27th avenue just west of us1 and it was very early in the morning. the sky was beginning to get light. we actually had the amazing luck to all be looking up and i was asking my two friends if they knew what a particular constellation  was (orion's belt) when one of the brightest meteors i've ever seen went directly over head. i have a place in upstate ny and have long been a fan of watching for shooting stars. it is so dark and clear up there that you can see satellites track across the sky all night long. i know the difference between meteors and satellites, stars vs. planets, i have a telescope and have take classes on astronomy when i was younger. 

i was really amazed at the brightness of the meteor... it really had lit up the sky all around it, despite the light pollution of the city all around us. not to mention that i've never really seen any that bright, and it was incredibly fortunate that all three of us had just happened to be looking in the right direction at the right time. needless to say, we all started skygazing at that point, and even saw two or three more shooting stars. we were on the top balcony on the 6th floor, and the balcony faces west and has a north/south orientation. while looking around and trying to figure out what some of the other brighter objects we could see were, we noticed a brightly flickering object high in the sky south and slightly east of our position. the more we looked at it, the more it became undeniable that it was stationary, and that it was changing colors and the light coming off of it was really bright. the owner of the apartment had gone to bed, but he keeps a really nice set of binoculars in the living room which we all began taking turns looking thru.

there was no doubt that the object was within the our atmosphere and not a celestial body. you could see the lights changing colors with the naked eye, but with the binoculars it was amazing. we all knew right away the person writing the other report for miami early in the morning of the 24th was seeing the same thing. we saw planes come and go, saw another two or three fainter shooting stars... but that object sat hovering in the same spot for close to two hours. it looked like it was at high altitude, somewhere over the keys. it was hard to gauge the distance, but it looked like it was maybe 10,000 feet up, and maybe 10 miles to the south. we watched it until we simply couldn't stay awake any longer.

i am writing this report at the same apartment, came back to watch the dolphins game, and thats when they told me they found the other report. hence, i felt compelled to write this. i've seen three other strange objects in my life, and even wrote in about one we saw in brazil back in 2004 i believe. if i can stick around late enough tonight, i plan to establish that that same light is not still there, thus establishing that it indeed was an object hovering there and not just a star or planet we were seeing. 

i wish we'd had any idea of who we could call when that was happening, would have been nice to get the news with a better camera catching it on video. 

jk
content.summary: Pulsing flashing lights

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting at my computer, which faces our north window, when a bright white colored object flew overhead from south east to north west.  i live on the 13th floor of a high rise.  object was fast and silent, sky was overcast.
object was like a fireball except there was no fire...It was just a bright white light moved in a straight line.
content.summary: Fast moving bright object observed

content.detailedDescription: I had just got on the express-way heading east on i-20 east heading towards greensboro. the sky was clear the stars were bright i noticed what i thought was a larger than normal star but the more i looked at it i realized it was closer to earth than the other stars and really large. as i was watching it i noticed it hadnt moved when all of a sudden it just took off. i knew it wasnt a plane or any aircraft we have there was no red rocket fuel streak of anything. it was gone in secs i knew nothing we have could have moved that fast. it went from not moving to being gone out of my site in seconds. i dont know what i seen i just know it was something unusal and i will always wonder.
content.summary: Thought i was looking at really large star.

content.detailedDescription: Sitting on a porch swing on the beach in nags head i looked out and saw a set of lights, hovering above where the waves break.  there were two lights in the middle and one each on the outside of the middle lights about 5 feet out  they were in a straight row and kind of looked like headlights.  they did not blink.  while i and others were watching an additional set of lights started out from the middle in a straight line til' they joined with the outside lights and then shot back to the middle and then it was gone.  what blows me away is that nobody said anything about it to anyone there .  i believe i remember asking the person i was sitting with if they saw it but we never talked about it.  like it was something you see everyday or you have no reason to talk about it.  i don't remember fear but i do remember feeling surprise.  i wonder too about the lack of discussion with anyone as we were not alone on that stretch of beach.
content.summary: Set of lights hung over where waves were breaking moved and then were gone

content.detailedDescription:
I had just moved to a new home located on longdale furnace rd., just down the street from the triangle country store, and across from the retirement home, i was 9 years old at the time. 

i was sleeping on a love seat in the living room as we had not moved our bedroom furnishings into the house at this time, my mother was asleep on the couch across from me, and my sister in a chair that was in front of the living room window, wich was facing towards the interstate off ramp wich is beside the triangle country store, several hundred feet from our house wich was nearby on a hill. the sighting occured through this window.

i awoke sometime  late that night, or in the early am hours of the morning. i do not know the exact time. my attention was directly drawn to the large window behind the chair my sister was sleeping in, as i was sleeping in a love seat facing this window. imediately i observe what i know to be a ufo from pictures i had seen in books, or perhaps from a movie such as et. i was stunned, very much in awe of this thing, it was huge, it is hard for me to say how far it was away but it appeared to be some distance. the craft contained 5 or 6 visible lights wich were circular in shape, they appeared to me to be the size of large vehichles or perhaps 15 yards in diameter. it also had some lights near the top of it that didn't go out, they appeared to be rectangular, or like grates or something. the length of this thing seemed to be very long, like 100 feet, or close to that. however with the fact that there are trees in the yard and none were visible, only this craft, it may have been very much closer and it may have been a smaller craft, though it still seemed so large to me. it was black or very dark gray and black, you could make out the shape and such from the flashing of the very bright lights. the spectrum of the lights was nothing like a regular bulb, and it did not project the light but it seemed to stay close with the craft only illuminating enough of the object to make out a basic outline.   

these lights flashed in strange patterns they would flash in a sucession with one illuminating for a moment, then it would fade out and then the next would light up, and so on down the line, it also did other patterns of alternate blinkings. i sat there in great fear watching this craft. 

i got up off the couch and tried to wake my mom up, "mom there's a ship outside!!!" "get up". i tried and tried to get her to awaken telling her repeatedly, but she could not be roused from her sleep. she told me to go to sleep and that i was going to scare my sister, from her mostly sleeping state. i really wanted my mom to see this, or someone. but, i didn't want to wake my sister up and scare her. so i went and lay back down on the couch and watched this craft for a long time. at some point durring watching it i drifted off to sleep, though i do not know how i could do such a thing, it was almost as though the lights hypnotized me or put me in a trance.

i specificaly remember taking mental pictures with my mind, that i would never forget this thing or what it looked like. to this day it is one of the most amazing things i have ever seen. i very much wished that our family would have had our video camera availabe, as a tape of this thing would blow any known footage of a ufo out the water. this thing was so strange and not normal. it could have been military, but i believe it was celestial, it was my first encounter with such a thing, though i have made other sightings since, far less up close, ones in the air.

i imediately knew this thing to be a ufo though i did not observe it flying, i would like to go back to the area, and look at the trees nearby to try and see what distance it might have been away, it seems that it was farther away and very very large, but there were some trees in our yard, it may be it was very much closer and that it was actually on the hillside, in the side yard of the house. the one thing that stands out to me most of all were those very large circular lights and the trance like patterns that they flashed, it was calming and unerving at the same time.

i did not feel like i was in terror, but i did feel aprehensive, were these aliens i wondered. i knew little on the subject, but had heard some adults talk about such things in the past. this thing truly amazed me, and had an affect on the rest of my life. it would not be the last time i seen objects. most recently in the past 2 years, i have had several alien contact experiences that occured in lucid dreams. when these started to occur memories immediately shifted to this first major event that happened when i was very young, might it be that i have been taken on such craft before? i would not doubt it. it seems that i have established a rapport with unknown entities. at this point i'm trying to figure out what's going on with me, and what everything means. theres so much i'd like to share, but this of course is not the place.

i lost sight of the object due to falling asleep, i don't remember having any dreams that night, just falling asleep at some point and then waking up the next day fully remembering the event. my mother has since passed away, and my sister never saw the object. so i am the lone witness of the event. i did tell most all the adults my mom, her friends, and my sister about my experience. 

very amazing experience, have been highly interested in ufo's ever since. this was not a hallucination, it was not a made up story, this is 100% accurate. 

i moved from that house about a year later, i no longer live in alleghany county virginia, i now live in central va.
content.summary: I was 9 years old, woke in the middle of night, saw craft landed on ground outside my window, 5 or six large circular flashing lights, huge craft

content.detailedDescription:
At around 5:24pm on saturday, october 24th i was outside taking pictures of the natural landscape as i am prone to do when i spotted a white round object sitting still in the sky at about 90 degrees from the horizon.  the object remained steady at the same spot in the sky and i quickly started taking pictures of it.  i was also able to yell towards the house and both my wife and my daughter ran out and also were able to observe the object while i continued to take more pictures.  throughout this whole process the object did not move from the location that it was first observed in the sky.
i was able to take 26 pictures in raw and 26 in jpeg before a group of clouds moved in and obscured the object from sight.  eventually the clouds moved away, however the object was no longer visible in the sky once visibility was clear again.  strangely enough the object was very similar in appearance to the previous object that i captured on october 11th of this year (as reported to the ufo center previously) except that this time it was not moving.
content.summary: White spherical object standing still in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was at a chevron some where between la and san francisco i have no idea where somewhere in the middle it was sept 1993 not sure of the day in the afternoon. i walked into the gas station/store and everyone froze  and the music cut out there was one customer one guy behind the counter. i walked to the counter about 10 ft away and then the guy moved the music started and i payed for some gas. it was extremely weird but i didn't say anything to the counter guy i walked to my girlfriends truck and she started yelling at me becuase i was in side for a half an hour but it was only a minute. as i was pumping gas i threw some trash in a trash can a black car pulled up with tinted window four door don't know the make or model but a fairly new probably american car the window rolled down and there was 2 or 3 people in the car all in black suits with sunglasses on the one next to window said "what are you doing here?" and "whats your name" this caught me off guard and i thought for a second and then i said i don't have to tell you anything and the guy smiled and said good answer then rolled up the window and drove away i turned back to look at the car it was totally gone. there was nothing around for miles and the rodes were empty it totally disappeared i was out where its just empty flat fields. that was it i just always thought that was weird i never knew who to tell this too i read about mibs like 2 years later and then of course that movie came out. but it happened i thought possibly it was the secret service because of some of the stuff i was involved in back then but anyway thats all i have to say. the only other thing was on the dash board was a lot of electronic devices like a cop car or something thats why i thought it was feds or something like that. never saw a ufo. if you have any questions email me i prefer to be anonymous.
content.summary: Mib's

content.detailedDescription: Some friends and i saw star-gazing at their home-we saw an unusually  bright star-like object moving towards the moon-it stopped completely-then reversed itself-then it moved very erratically in the sky for a few minutes. my friends and i were astounded and completely shocked and in disbelief because of it's movements-especially the way it stopped and reversed.It then disappeared completely.
content.summary: Star ovject moved unlike airplane-complete stop/reverse and erratic movements

content.detailedDescription: I was in my room watching television and my dogs started barking at something.  i had seen a ufo before and thought to look up into the night sky when i heard the dogs barking.  and i looked up into the sky and a bright star-like object was flashing many different colors; yet i ran outside with a quickness.  i was the only one that i am aware of that has witnessed this: my family was asleep and i am not near any neighbors.  coyotes were howling and barking outside.  so, i knew the dogs were barking at the coyotes,but, my focus was on the star-like object just hovering in the eastern sky from my house.  i can describe the object as moving from north east east to south east direction very slowly.  the object was very far away, but distinguishable from an ordinary aircraft.  i watched the object outside for about 10 minutes.  than i went back into the house and fell asleep 10 minutes later.  it never disapeared from the nights sky.
content.summary: I saw what looked like a very bright star towards the east.  it was very bright and flashing all kind of colors.

content.detailedDescription:
Me my mom and my boyfriend were on our way home from the movies we were talking about it my mom says whats that we were driving and there were lights it looked like lights on top of one of those cell towers thats how close and low it was, we all are like freaking out... mom pulls off the road it had not moved till we stoped and got out of the car then it started moving away pretty fast tried to take a picture

we couldnt see the object it was dark out but the lights where big it was pretty close. lights where in a triangle shape.

we got home like 5 mins after that looked in the sky and there is so many jets in the sky like we've never seen before iv smoked about ten cigarettes since then we are all extremely excited about this it was so close to us we each drew a picture of what we seen and its the same for all of us moms calling everyone about it hoping we see some pics or vids of it soon online other people had to of seen it to
content.summary: Triangle lights realy close

content.detailedDescription:
On october 24th at 608 pm gregory h. 13 yrs and alex l. also 13 were outside their rural neighborhood playing in the street. they both noticed a star -like sphere at an etimated distance of 2-3 miles and an estimated altitude of 15 k feet. it was rising from the horizon as planes would from the local houston ic airport but made a complete and immediate 90 degree turn in midflight that appeared to be traveling much faster than commercial aircraft and drew the attention of both teenagers.

at this time 3 other identical objects also rose from the horizon and matched altitude with the original object.At this time alex went inside his home to get a pair of high quality binoculars.During the 2-3 minutes he was doing this greg said the original object shifted into a diamond and the others remained spherical.Greg also noticed what appeared to be a helicopter 3-5 miles in the distance approaching the objects at a much slower rate.When alex returned from getting the binoculars he also noticed the diamond shape.

both report that the other 3 objects begin to move towards the west at a much faster rate than other aircraft normally seen in the area.They both also report that the object shifted into a triangle at this time all the while remaining blue luminescent. as alex looke through the binoculars at the object both witnesses state the object seemed to simply disappear before the helicopter could reach the area. no other helicopters or craft were seen in the 2 hours following the incident.Also strangely enough air traffic in the area seemed unusually slow following this incident.

we live only 12 miles from hou ic airport and both kids are used to seeing air traffic in the area.I am the father of greg h. and what gives this sighting credibility to me is that both children are honor roll gifted and talented program children who have proven their honesty and character many times.Greg is in the rotc program and knows basic astronomy and has a good knowledge of the types of local aircraft with above avg time spent observing the sky.Alex is in the scouts and also has some astronomy experience and is quite observant. i was an investigator for the state of texas for several years and took notes within an hour of the sighting from both witnesses independently and their stories were completely consistent in such a way i dont believe they could have recalled a false story with such consistently had it not been true.Both kids are of above average character and intelligence and this carries weight with me because about 3 years ago i saw something like this with another witness in almost the same area and never reported it because i am in a security related field and worried about reprecussions. one final interesting note is we live less than 2 miles from the famous cash ufo encounter in dayton,tx where multiple witnesses saw several ufos and trailing black copters which were caught on film. several very credible and honest people that i personally know were intimidated by "govt types" after the original cash incident.

while i am a firm believer in ufos both children appear to be slightly skeptical yet open minded.Both state that the objects were absolutely not wind powered craft and appeared to move many times faster than any aircraft they have ever seen.They both claim to have felt excited as the craft began to change shape and make 90 degree turns that apparently seemed to prove they were non terrestrial.They also felt disbelief and doubt at what they were seeing and seemed quite puzzled and curious when questioned.As a trained investigator i can tell you that the level of consistency from the seperated witnesses was so high that i can only assume it was true and pretty damn accurate.Keep an eye on these skys because we have had an increase in the last few years.We have since bought a digital camera and dvr to attempt to catch activity on film.
content.summary: Multiple shapeshifting objects that were visible at dusk performing unatural aerobatic manuevers and morphing with two consistent and credible teenage witnesses.

content.detailedDescription: We were on a street called pflumm in lenexa ks and my son says daddy what is that.  i looked up and saw a jagged chevron in the sky with a small craft following close behind.  i almost hit the van in front of me because i was so suprised.  i saw multiple flashing colors and heard no sound.  i am 42 years old and my son is 10 years old.  we both saw exactly the same thing.  it moved in a sideways motion as if it was gliding through the sky at a super slow speed.  it was about 200 to 300 feet off of the ground.
content.summary: Almost like a jagged chevron

content.detailedDescription: I also saw the same triangle planes bottomes were all black i was up kinda high the tops seem to change alittle at a distance the seemed flat thats why it caught my eye it changed the lights that were in a row on the bottom it was a fantastic light show it change lights form read to blue yeah a police vehicle noooo these lights grew dimmer and got intensly bright they were in a straight light on a large flat <it looked lighter than air because it seemed to float but it definatly pulled some arobatics so while im looking at the one in the distance and all the helicopters flying around it all the sudden i here a sound like a plane small plane and a black helicopter flys past directly ova my high rise and headed the opposite way a traingle was moving over the building very slowly <floating/flying> it was so black you really couldnt see it but i saw the giant shadow in the dark the triangle dwarfed this black heli<this was a heli with lights, but acting ya know nonchalant in a pitch black hi tech quiet helicopter can be flying ova the bronx> while traveling in the opposite direction the helicopter started to turn on lights <ova my apartment!!!!!> it turned on 3 then 4 then 3 lights like the traingle that was further away still shining lights while being swarmed by i say 5-6 helicopters that yes it was night time but they had no light s and then the would turn on a set and then bam there was a heli!!! it was two very large ufos at once and i have witnesses!!!! after the trangle passed completly over the helicopter i heard a rumble and it moved slow but fast .... like i can explain slow but fast,the craft didnt tremble the was a movement like a glass flying through the air<sharp>it moved very far but it seemed like it was drifting slowly the helicopter was moving very quickly by comparison
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: 2 triangles and 7 black helicopters

content.detailedDescription:
It was 1:54am and got up to turn off the tv, i looked at my window facing towards the (east side, of coconut grove) when all of a sudden a flashing light in the distance caught my attention.  flying plane lights it's what i usually tend to see at night at a distance, but this twinkle flash light was different......I grabbed my binoculars and was stunt by what i was seeing, it seemed as if the lights were shining diamonds (despite the fact that they were at a distance) i have never seen so brightness coming from a flying artifact.  i couldn't tell how many lights the ufo had but they seemed white and blue*.  after 30 minutes of looking at the object it all of a sudden started moving slowly, and at one point it ascended so fast that it disappear from my view and thought to myself that it was over. shortly after about a few seconds the flying object reappear again (like in the same altitude, at least from my visual calculation) in the same area were initially it was hovering.   again, this continue until 3:00am were the object kept moving slowly as if it was hovering and at times it just seemed as if it was flying at a high altitude due to how smaller the flash light or object seemed to fade and then it would descend.  i had visual contact of the object from 1:54am until 3:00am, i couldn't stay up but the flashing light object stay hovering in the same area......... also a helicopter with a bright light was flying at the time of the incident (at a much lower altitude of course) and for some reason it kept going around, i don't know if this helps but im trying to be as detail as possible.

my conclusion:
no airplane (for sure)
no helicopter(no way)
no weather balloon(give me a break!)
no flairs (yeah right)
i have never seen a ufo before, im enthusiastic on this topic and i believe this was a flying object that was behaving in a very odd way.  i will continue to monitor this again,and report it if necessary but i won't loose sleep this time.
content.summary: Flashing lights

content.detailedDescription: On thursday night there were 2 aircrafts flying in circles over manhattan...One of them was flying uptown/the other downtown...They look triangular shape from my angle...With flashing lights, different pattern(green light in the front(pulsing light)and red and white lights on each end of the wings(flashing). also they had another set of lights, but less bright...They remind me to the murrysville ufos that you can watch in youtube...The comercial traffic at the time of the event was normal...They spent about more or less 4 hrs doing this. also they were black helicopters flying very low with their tail lit only by a red light. no more lights on them...The next morning i saw one of them (early morning)flying very low over the river...This one was black, no logo, and i think it was a uh-60 black hawk or something similar to it(i think they were military helicopters)...I'm surprised that no one else has reported this....
content.summary: Strange planes over ny.

content.detailedDescription: I was looking south. and there were two crafts with red and white blinking lights traveling east to south west.  i couldnt tell how far away they were.  whether it was one mile or ten miles.  im leaning more towards the closer side.  but they appeared to be very low. it was about 9 pm, so it was dark already.  but they appeared to be just above the horizon of the mountains.  so, i took a cue from dr. steven greer, and i tried to mentally communicate with them. after a few seconds the second craft sped up and was in then in front of the other, but maintained their course to the west, south west.  i ran inside to get my girlfriend.  but becuase of their blinking lights she dismissed them as planes.  but i didnt hear any jet or helicopter noise at all.  and their blinking lights were not even similar.  if they were military, they should blink in the same repetition. but each of the crafts blinking appeared to be totally random. i know that cseti is having their conference in rio rico right now.  so i didnt want to interfere.  i hope that was the direction that they were heading. lets hope cseti gets come good evidence (sigh...)
content.summary: Either military or et.  2 flying objects at night. probably et though.

content.detailedDescription: Sometime in the summer of 1974, me and a childhood friend, we were both 12 years old at the time, were at the local baseball field at around 9:00 pm in kingston, ma.  this night was clear but dark, not much of a moon. i remember this because i had dared my friend to walk across to the playground as it was unlit and two baseball fields away and it was, a dark night.  the area is nestled in the woods surrounded by trees and sparsely populated. as we started walking we got about to the pitchers mound when the sky in front of us flashed red. the flash was not like a lingering flash; it was extremely quick and seemed to span the horizon. my friend said��� did you see that���.  it was very strange, and the color was vivid. i remember at the time thinking i hope it���s not the nuclear power plant exploding; the plant is about 15 miles down the coast.   as we continued walking east, i noticed an object about 20��� on the horizon coming from our 11:00 position.  my father fly���s as a hobby as i do know and i had grown up around airplanes.  it had red, blue and green lights in a circular pattern that were spinning. it looked like nothing i had ever seen. as we watched it come closer it was at our 9:00 position; it seemed to be flying along the railroad tracks when it suddenly stopped.  i new it was not a helicopter because it made no sound and no aircraft looked like this. at this time it began coming toward us.  i would say around 10-15 mph maybe. i could see it looked like two saucers facing each other with the lights spinning in between. it seemed to have no color that i recall. it was about 100 feet away from us when it stopped and a beam of light hit the ground.  the beam had a sort of bright bluish tinge. the beam of light started to scan the ground, up back left and right. i told my friend not to move or it will see us. the object was around 100 feet high or so, it was hard to tell and it could have been 20 to 40 feet in diameter. the beam then went off and the object proceeded to move about 50 feet to our right and did the same thing with the beam, again the beam went off. now the object moved closer, to just above our heads and again the light hit within 10 or 15 feet away and i heard my friend start to whimper.  the light came to a point so close that i felt i could touch it, then nothing the light was gone the object was gone with no sound. we never saw it leave although i was looking at the light on the ground moving around because i didn���t want it to see us so i never actually saw it vanish, but it was gone in a second.  we both ran to my house five minutes away and told my younger brother and mother what happened.  naturally my brother wanted to go see so we went back.  the three of us walked down a steep hill, it���s a road about 200 yards to the ball field.  once there we saw nothing then we only walked out maybe 25 feet and the beam landed right in front of us. we all ran, my brother got to the top of the hill first and i heard a car skidding down the road, it nearly hit him as he ran across the street. my father, a policeman in our town drove me down in the police car, but we saw nothing. i later found out the police station had got a call from someone else who also saw it. we never saw any sign of it ever again.  my friend and i went down to the ball field many nights after that just hoping to see it again, but i can never forget what i saw.
content.summary: Disk emitting beam.

content.detailedDescription: This is basicly a follow up story to my mom's story. i was sitting in the back seat of my truck around 10:00 pm i was also lisning to my mp-3 player. then my mom and dad started saying that they could see somthing in the sky so i quikly turned off my mp-3 and looked towards the sky. sure enogh there was a big brite orange ball of light and i started to get scared. i am in the civil air patrol and know what ground observation is and it was no plane nor missle. it wasn't a helicopter either the ball of light was about he size of a penny if you staitened out your arm. we were north east of mcgill out by lages junction. when we saw the first light then we pulled over before we got to lages  to se if we would see them again. then a minute passed we decided to pull up to the junction and parked in a parking lot we saw two more ufos at the same time then they disapeared and i was focosed on he sky rihgt in front of me about 1o minutes later we  were getting ready to go when we saw three of them. after the fact we saw 5 or 6 jets on sfter burner that was when we left they came from the soth wst vegas area then we saw no more ufos
content.summary: Big brite orange rond object

content.detailedDescription:
it was friday night, oct 23rd and i was at home playin poker online with a couple of  friends. we decided to take a break to have a drink and cigarette. as i stepped outside something in the sky immediately caught my eye. it was a ball of light that seemed to be changing colour. i could see it very clearly and knew right away that it wasn't a plane or helicopter, so i ran inside and grabbed my mobile phone to film it. it was moving slowly initially but then seemed to speed up and quickly flew off into the distance. 

 i've never seen anything like this before and was baffled, i've always been a bit sceptical of ufo sighting reports and have no real interest in looking for ufo's or anything like that, this was a first and i found it quite an eerie experience. i don't know what it was, i'm not claiming it to be 'paranormal' i'm just baffled and pleased i managed to get some footage. make of it what you will, or maybe someone can explain it?

 i'm sure there are much better reports and footage than mine but hopefully people will find it interesting and i thought i'd better report it to someone because it definitely wasn't something you would expect to see in the sky whilst standing outside your house in the city!


 i've tried sending the video using the online 'multimedia attachments' but i keep getting an error.

 the video is now posted on youtube:

 http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=zevtqqlxc48

 

 kind regards

 andy (leeds, uk)
content.summary: A ball of light that seems to change colour, started moving slowly but then sped up and flew of into the distance

content.detailedDescription:
I live in hungary (europe). i was on the terrace (about 11 am) when i noticed this slowly flying, noiseless, dark brown disk shaped object. i caught my mobile phone (samsung sgh-e250) and i did a photo from the object. the diameter of the object was approximately 30-40 feet. the picture was taken on kaposvar, hungary.
tibor
content.summary: Disc shaped ufo with photo!

content.detailedDescription: See above.....Object was fast and steady speed..My grandson said it was a weather thing
content.summary: Red dot looking object moving very fast from south toward north.

content.detailedDescription:
On the evening of sunday the 14th of june, myself and my team of paranormal investigators where arriving at the fremantle prison for an tour evening we where helping with.  (the prison is now a major tourist attraction). it was approximately 17.58hours, and the sun had set some 30mins prior. as wer were getting the equipment out of the car, i noticed a bright object in the sky, traveling approx nw to se. one of our investigators erica keijzer had her camera at the ready and took the included video.
the object was the brightest in the sky, and was moving in a straight direction, and quite fast. as erica filmed it, my son and i took time to note the conditions. it was cloudy to the east, and the object eventually disappeared into the clouds. the footage hows a few things. the place we were, you can see the stacks of the old prison, the camera went from enhanced nigt mode to super night shot, and had to reframe to get good reference points. the object pulsated, and it appeared to to resemble any known aircraft i/we have seen. it moved fluidly, and at a constant speed. there were high clouds, but this flew under them, until it disappeared into a cloud in the sw of our position.
content.summary: Ufo sighting over fremantle

content.detailedDescription: Hanging out with friends outside in a grass area. then i see a very bright star and point it out to a friend a few minutes later. most friends believed it was a star, and one thought it was a plane. but it was extraordinarily bright. then it appeared to be moving at an upward diagonal, and before we knew it, it was approaching in our direction and was immediately above us just one minute after thinking it was a star. it was like it changed shapes and lights formations the whole way and so first appeared to be a plane approaching with bright white lights, then a triangle with blue and red lights on the tips, and then an airplane as it was right above us, i meant directly above us. and it couldn't have been more than 700 feet above the ground but strangely enough, if we weren't outside i doubt we would have ever heard it because it was sooo quiet, and the sound was like that of a super sonic jet, only muffled as it flew relatively slow above us. and a strange thing about the aircraft as if flew directly above us was that it had three very bright lights in a triangle formation on the front of the cockpit and never before have i seen that on an airplane. i am convinced that this is an alien craft that can not only change its shape but also make sounds to resemble an airplane. at the time of the event, all the things i described happened so fast that i my mind couldn't comprehend what was happening, so i simply had to tell myself that it had to be an airplane. i was not scared much but definitely excitedm confused and mystified. i just watched it fly off in the shape of some kind of long airplane until it went out of my sight behind the houses
content.summary: Triangle like, black sides, but then morphed into an airplane shape much longer than before
